name: Turret Turmoil
description:
Turret Turmoil Tower Defense. But your towers break

Many years ago, there was an idea to build a perfect AI. The AI would place the turrets perfectly. And it did. The problem is, the turrets it placed weren't the best. They could break and run out of ammo. That's the reason you're here. You have to fix the turrets or fill them up with ammo.

Info

Game made by Exquizzit and xXxT0SHIIIxXx. Submission for the Wowie Game Jam 4.
